name: Numeromancer
description:
In fourth grade, we had these things called math minutes, where we would start every school day with a sheet of math problems. We had to answer as many as we could in a minute. Numeromancer is the same way: you have a minute to answer as many addition and subtraction problems as you can. Every correct answer powers the Numeromancer's spell, allowing her to summon a more powerful familiar!

Controls: Enter to select the play and reset buttons, and to submit answers. Use the number keys to  type your answer!

This game was made over the week of 9/13/2020, as the first in my deck of many games, where I try to make a game a week, every week, for a year.
